name: Gappy & The Red Eyesore
description:
UNFINISHED CURRENTLY. This is a fangame for Levi Ramirez's Gappy character (in a virtual boy style). The story is that Gappy is on a stroll one day, tricked into falling into a pit by an evil coin! Can you help Gappy escape this pit by beating all 37 levels and getting all the wealth along the way? (Newgrounds Link)

(Medals are NG exclusive, this is for access if you can't connect to NG or if you want offline play).

Credits:

  • AmphibianOblivion: Art & Code
  • gavmcool: Music
  • Solaraloe: Music
  • LeviRamirez: Creator of Gappy & Chester Bodean

Also if you're interested, please support Levi Ramirez's Ko-Fi & join the Gappy's Playground Discord Server (great community) where I posted this game's development, & where Levi posts updates for the full version of Gappy's Playground, thanks!
